body: I'm not an electron developer, so I'm not sure I can help you. Pretty sure that atom team keeps track of these and should be by to respond soon.
Closing until more information is provided.

I have a similar issue that occurs when my custom protocol accesses another server to proxy. Here is the stack trace for anyone else. It is going to take me a good bit of time to create a tiny reproducible test case for this.

```

I have this problem too with version 1.4.13
I load a native plugin that works smoothly under node.exe in console.
The plugin is then rebuilt against Electron 1.4.13 of course.
The plugin is loaded from an Angular2 component constructor (typescript)

When I start electron under Windbg x64 the app crash with this stack:

```
2:029> kp

Thank you
